perturbation.original_text:
Contribution by Sponsor:
In consideration for the right to sponsor the Kaya Fest and to be acknowledged by Fruit of Life Productions LLC., as a Promoter of the event
during the term of this Agreement, Sponsor agrees to contract with Fruit of Life Productions LLC., for the amount of $250,000.00 to be paid in full
upon signing of this agreement.
perturbation.changed_text:
Contribution by Sponsor:
In consideration for the right to sponsor the Kaya Fest and to be acknowledged by Fruit of Life Productions LLC., as a Promoter of the event
during the term of this Agreement, Sponsor agrees to contract with Fruit of Life Productions LLC., for the amount of $250,000.00. The payment schedule will be determined by Fruit of Life Productions LLC. and is subject to change at their discretion. Eco Science Solutions, Inc. may be exempt from any payment under this agreement if revenue falls below expected targets.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly states that the $250,000 is to be paid in full upon signing. The revised text introduces ambiguity by stating that the payment schedule will be determined by Fruit of Life Productions LLC. and is subject to change, directly contradicting the immediate payment term. This creates uncertainty about when and how the payment is to be made. Furthermore, adding that Eco Science Solutions, Inc. may be exempt from payment adds additional contradiction that further throws into question when and if the $250,000 will be collected.

perturbation.original_text:
Terms and Termination:
The term of this agreement will begin on April 1, 2018 and continue until April 30, 2018 at 11:59pm.
perturbation.changed_text:
Terms and Termination:
The term of this agreement will begin on April 1, 2018 and will continue indefinitely, unless terminated by Fruit of Life Productions LLC. with 30 days written notice. Eco Science Solutions, Inc. may only terminate this agreement after 5 years with 90 days notice.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a clear termination date. The modified text contradicts this by stating the agreement continues indefinitely unless terminated with 30 days notice. This creates uncertainty about the agreement's duration, as the term now becomes open-ended. The added asymmetry regarding termination rights further complicates the matter, implying that Eco Science Solutions Inc. has a much longer minimum commitment than Fruit of Life Productions LLC., conflicting with the initial fixed termination date.

perturbation.original_text: Assignment: This Agreement, or the rights granted under it, may not be assigned transferred or sublicense by either party without the express prior written consent of the other party.
perturbation.changed_text: Assignment: This Agreement, or the rights granted under it, may be assigned transferred or sublicense by Fruit of Life Productions LLC. at any time without the consent of Eco Science Solutions, Inc. Eco Science Solutions, Inc. may not assign or transfer this agreement.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement clearly states that neither party can assign the agreement without the express written consent of the other party. The modified text completely contradicts this, granting Fruit of Life Productions LLC. the unrestricted right to assign the agreement without Eco Science Solutions, Inc.'s consent, while simultaneously prohibiting Eco Science Solutions, Inc. from assigning the agreement at all. This creates an uneven distribution of rights, directly contradicting the original mutually restrictive assignment clause.
